alert.note: Alert for Glascock; Jefferson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:45AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Glascock and northern Jefferson Counties through 615 AM EST... At 545 AM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Edgehill, or near Gibson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Wrens, Stapleton, Avera, Edge Hill, Edgehill, Matthews, Stellaville and Stapletons Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately.
